note:
covert psychonautic freakazoid embedded in the most suburbia of suburbs. seriously, three kids, a dog, a backyard - how did I get here?

Zero tolerance for fundamentalism, exclusionary ideologies, or ignore-ance of any kind, especially my own. Truth with a capital T only exists in paradoxes.

25 years as a respiratory therapist doing bedside care. Night shift only - I can't stand the shiny day people and the clipboard warriors.

"Fuck Donald Trump" - Marc Rebillet
